file_insights.purpose: Hebrew language translation file for BuilderOps application
file_insights.structure: Nested object with 'app' and 'nav' sections containing key-value pairs for UI strings

patterns_discovered.description: Translation files organized in locales directory with language code as filename (he.json for Hebrew)
patterns_discovered.significance: Follows standard internationalization conventions for managing multi-language content

patterns_discovered.description: Translation keys follow camelCase convention with hierarchical organization (app.name, nav.dashboard, etc.)
patterns_discovered.significance: Maintains consistency with other locale files and ensures predictable key access patterns

patterns_discovered.description: Translation file includes all major navigation and app-level strings for BuilderOps platform
patterns_discovered.significance: Ensures comprehensive localization support for Hebrew-speaking users across the application

gotchas_discovered.description: File created without verification that all keys match English locale counterpart
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Consider adding validation step to ensure Hebrew translations have matching keys with source language

gotchas_discovered.description: Hebrew is an RTL language but JSON file contains only text translations without RTL-specific CSS or layout directives
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Verify that application CSS/components properly support RTL layout for Hebrew locale

gotchas_discovered.description: File was created in one session without subsequent review or refinement attempts
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Consider adding review process for translation accuracy and cultural appropriateness

approach_outcome.description: Hebrew translation file successfully created with complete app and navigation section translations

recommendations.recommendation: Add automated test to verify all locale files have matching key structures
recommendations.rationale: Prevents inconsistencies between language files that could cause missing translations at runtime

recommendations.recommendation: Test Hebrew UI rendering with actual RTL layout to ensure navigation and text display correctly
recommendations.rationale: Hebrew requires RTL layout support which may not be properly reflected in translation file alone

recommendations.recommendation: Document translation workflow and guidelines for future locale additions
recommendations.rationale: Ensures consistency and quality for subsequent language translations

recommendations.recommendation: Compare Hebrew translation keys against main English locale to verify full coverage
recommendations.rationale: Confirms no navigation items or app strings were missed in the Hebrew translation
